decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - Amended development description: 
Demolition of existing building (Class A1/B1) and erection of a building in connection with provision of retail unit (Class A1) on ground floor and residential units (Class C3) above with private balconies and communal roof terrace. Provision of waste and cycle storage and landscaping.
Condition : 2 - Condition 2: Part a) The development shall be carried out in accordance with the reports, specifications and drawings detailed [4771/PA/001, 4771/PA/020 A, 4771/PA/021, 4771/PA/022, 4771/PA/023a, 4771/PA/024, 4771/PA/025, 4771/PA/026a, 4771/PA/030 B, 4771/PA/031 B, 4771/PA/040a, 4771/PA/041 A, 4771/PA/042 B, Ground Floor - Landscape Plan, Roof Garden - Landscape Plan.]

Part b) The building shall be no higher than 5 storeys.

Part c) There shall be no more than 29 residential units (Use Class C3).

Reason: To ensure a satisfactory standard of development and to allow the local planning authority to review any potential changes to the scheme.
description: Non material amendment to planning permission dated 05/01/2022 ref 2020/0457 (Demolition of existing building (Class A1/B1) and erection of part 3/4/5 storey building in connection with provision of retail unit (Class A1) on ground floor and 29 residential units (Class C3) above with private balconies and communal roof terrace. Provision of waste and cycle storage and landscaping) to allow the wording of the description to be "Demolition of existing building (Class A1/B1) and erection a building in connection with provision of retail unit (Class A1) on ground floor and residential units (Class C3) above with private balconies and communal roof terrace. Provision of waste and cycle storage and landscaping".
